mapper.select: select ROLE_UNO from TBL_USER_role where uno = #{uno}
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_USER (uno, id, pwd, enabled, name, email, tel) values (SEQ_USER.nextval, #{id}, #{pwd}, 1, #{name}, #{email}, #{tel})
mapper.select: select id from TBL_USER where name = #{name} or email = #{email}
select * from TBL_USER where id = #{id} or name = #{name} or email = #{email}
